name: QPee & Elka
description:
Get forced to work for Elka, you'll have to build a statue to display all her majesty! The statue must be build using the balloons in the area but be careful you are a porcupine and balloons don't like you! Dodge push and collect the balloons until the statue is done.

Kb/m Controls

  • AD: Move
  • W/Space: Jump
  • Esc: Restart

Gamepad Controls

  • Left Stick: Move
  • A: Jump
  • Start: Restart

Created by

  • Kirk Markarian http://www.kirkmarkarian.net/
  • Bram van Elderen http://www.bramvanelderen.net/
